title: Russia presses demands, and faces pressure, as Ukraine talks move to Geneva
summary_full: High casualties and economic trouble signal time is no longer on Russia’s side, but Moscow isn’t backing off political and territorial demands to weaken Ukraine.
summary_public: High casualties and economic trouble signal time is no longer on Russia’s side, but Moscow isn’t backing off political and territorial demands to weaken Ukraine.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Moscow isn’t backing off political and territorial demands to weaken Ukraine.
